name: Dark Matter ELO-536
desc: Increases All-Type RES PEN for Ultimate DMG dealt by ally targets by 20%. For every enemy target on the field, the All-Type RES PEN for the Ultimate DMG dealt additionally increases by 3%. This effect lasts until the next time an Ultimate is used.
enhanced_desc: Increases All-Type RES PEN for Ultimate DMG dealt by ally targets by 25%. For every enemy target on the field, the All-Type RES PEN for the Ultimate DMG dealt additionally increases by 3%. This effect lasts until the next time an Ultimate is used.
